TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RuleSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class RuleSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET 事件规则。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET event rules.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件规则可确定使用哪个配置文件，哪些事件激发到的提供程序。Event rules determine which event, using which profile, is fired to which provider. ## Examples 下面的配置文件摘录演示如何以声明方式指定的属性类。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify the properties of the class. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和设置的值类型。The following code example shows how to create and set the values of the type. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置自定义类的完全限定类型，该类用于实现 。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified type of a custom class that implements .

value.span: 实现 的自定义类的完全限定类型。

span.span: The fully qualified type of a custom class that implements .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按以下方式形成类型引用 （括号中的项不是必需的）： *Namespace*。*Typename*， *Assemblyname*[、] [版本 = x，] [区域性 = y，] [PublicKeyToken = z]。The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): *Namespace*.*Typename*, *Assemblyname*[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]. 例如，"ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType，Example.Assembly，版本 = %assembly_version%，区域性 = neutral，PublicKeyToken = %microsoft_publickey%"For example, "ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%" ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性所引用的对象必须包含由同一个也包含此对象 The object referenced by this property must be contained by the same object that also contains this 的名称。object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#86](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#86)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#86](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#86)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置引发相同类型事件的最大次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.

value.span: 引发相同类型事件的最大次数。

span.span: The maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性必须大于零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 无效的值可能导致保存的配置节时引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 这表示将引发事件的相同类型的最大次数。This represents the maximum number of times an event of the same type will be raised. 例如，如果值为`10`，则将引发 10 次，之后便忽略该事件。For example, if the value is `10`, then the event will be raised 10 times and ignored thereafter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#89](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#89)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#89](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#89)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinInstances { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在事件引发至提供程序之前相同类型事件的最少发生次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event before the event is raised to the provider.

value.span: 在事件引发至提供程序之前相同类型事件的最少发生次数。

span.span: The minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event before the event is raised to the provider.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性必须大于零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 无效的值可能导致保存的配置节时引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 这表示事件发生之前将引发一个事件到提供程序最小次数。This represents the minimum number of times an event occurs before an event is raised to the provider. 例如，如果返回值为`5`，则该事件的第五个实例出现前，ASP.NET 不会引发一个事件到该提供程序。For example, if the return value is `5`, then ASP.NET will not raise an event to the provider until the fifth instance of the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#90](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#90)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#90](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#90)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MinInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置两个相同类型事件之间的最小时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum time interval between two events of the same type.

value.span: 相同类型的两个事件之间的最小时间间隔。

span.span: The minimum time interval between two events of the same type.
The default value is 0 ticks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可以通过无限将其设置为。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 无效的值可能导致保存的配置节时引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 如果值为零，则没有最小时间间隔。If the value is zero, then there is no minimum interval. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
